thread.title: German workers widen strikes in wage disputes

title: German workers widen strikes in wage disputes
text:
German workers widen strikes in wage disputes 10:45pm IST - 01:46 
Powerful German union IG Metall has vowed to step up industrial action ahead of a round of negotiations with employers as it pushes for higher wages and the right to shorter hours for 3.9 million German workers. David Pollard reports.   
Powerful German union IG Metall has vowed to step up industrial action ahead of a round of negotiations with employers as it pushes for higher wages and the right to shorter hours for 3.9 million German workers. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2AMZD20
